Hi, I recommend You this news

Hi! 
I recommend to install the mobile application "%1$s" 
This aggregator with more than 40 major news sites. 
News updates in the background. 
Keeps the smartphone full text. 
It is therefore convenient to read on the subway, train or plane.
There are no events corresponding a filter

How to place your event on this list? 
 
Just create it on the www.2Event.com website 
Free
Rate it please, so we quickly developed
NO, I DONT WANT TO RATE
Are you sure you want to delete all news?
\nWe are the company, which develops mobile application.

This application is able to aggregate news and articles from the main of these sites. 
Updates and caches in the background. 
 
Easy to read in metro, train or during the fly. 
Easy to use, opens instantly. 
No ads and no banners. 
Without any animation. - Simple text and illustrations of news to the them. 
From each news are direct links to the website source. And, link to mobile application, if here media have this. 
 
This app can aggregate the main news sites of Ukraine and update news in the background. 
Convenient to read in plane or train, where is a bad internet connection. Easy to use, opens instantly. No advertising and no banners. Without unnecessary animations, with page turning effects. 
Just text of the news and pictures to it. To each news item there are direct link to the website. And also to the mobile app if that mass media have some. 
We can inexpensively quickly develop similar application for diferrent media. 
Development period- one week 
Two platforms- iOS and Android 1.500$ price per set 
Possible partial barter - 500$ in cash 2000$ - through an advertising barter 
At the same time site of the customer will be automatically connected to the sources list

Привилегии подписки: 
 
 Доступ к VIP источникам новостей 
 Отсутствие любой рекламы 
 
Вы можете оплатить любую сумму, которую считаете справедливой. 70% полученных сумм распределятся между VIP-новостными источниками. Таким образом, вы поддерживаете журналистов, для которых написание статтей, это действительно главный способ зарабатывать на жизнь.

Yaroslav Maxymovych

Server is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
This news was circulated news with aggregator

2Event - free mobile app, events affiche, transport tickets, event tickets. The app helps you to organize your travel, book the hotel, hostel, watch bus schedule, find out the train station - choose the best variant of the trip. 2EVENT- is your guide to the world of travelling without borders. Are you travelling on your car? Make check-in – find fellow travelers. Find roommates in hotels and hostels- save your money! Chat. Here you can meet fellow travelers- does not forget to share with your experiences. Everyone finds something interesting in 2EVENT. Authorize; fill in your profile and find minded and fellow travelers. To buy tickets you need only a bank card.

Who is around? Where are your friends, group mates, colleagues? Meet somewhere in the city or at the airport? Are you looking to where the concert or after party is going to be? Are you traveling with your friends in separate cars or trains? Our app works in real time regime! It is FREE. Find new friends around you. Find the café, where your friends are at the moment. Are you going to the meeting? Download the application in order to find out where your partner is, and, maybe, change the place of the meeting. In our Free App, we provide you with the information about your friend’s displacement.

Thank you! your voice is accepted!

Полное содержание этой статьи ограничено редакцией. 
 
Чтобы прочитать полностью: 
 
 1. Оформите подписку. 
 И читайте сразу все VIP-СМИ упорядоченными по времени и закешированными в нашем приложении. Вам понравится что стоимость подписки вы определяете сами, платите столько сколько посчитаете справедливым. От 9.99 грн. за мес. при чем первый месяць бесплатный При этом полученные деньги распределяются между СМИ, пропорционально к количеству просмотренных их статей. 
 
2. Перейдите на сайт этого СМИ (займет до 8 сек.) 
 
3. Откройте приложение этого СМИ (займет до 5 сек.)
Please click BACK again to exit
